document.full_text: a program including regular follow-ups with nurses and focused attempts to cut back on tv, fast food, and sodas appears to keep some overweight and obese kids from gaining more weight, according to a new study.
document.title: nurses may help some overweight kids
lines_and_colors: a program including regular follow-ups with nurses and focused attempts to cut back on tv, fast food, and sodas appears to keep some overweight and obese kids from gaining more weight, according to a new study.
